example.text: Yet three years later, Biden's FBI and Department of Energy have concluded Covid-19 was created in a Chinese lab. I look forward to reviewing the ODNI's report and holding China accountable for their egregious actions.

96 Congressional Update from Representative Hunt Hello, I am honored to share with you an update from our in-district events, media appearances, and an important bill that I am co-leading. I am proud to co-lead the bipartisan Debbie Smith Act of 2023 There is a staggering backlog of unsolved criminal cases across the United States, including over 100,000 in Harris County, Texas.

The Debbie Smith Act has already matched nearly 200,000 DNA cases since 2005, and with this reauthorization, Congress will be able to continue supporting our brave men and women in Law Enforcement and the victims of sexual assault and homicide. It is time to put an end to the backlog of untested and unanalyzed DNA evidence and hold perpetrators accountable.

I voted in favor of S 619 - COVID-19 Origin Act of 2023 S 619 requires the Office of the Director of National Intelligence (ODNI) to declassify all information relating to potential links between the Wuhan Institute of Virology and the origin of COVID-19. For years Democrats called Republicans conspiracy theorists when we claimed Covid-19 was not a natural occurring virus.

The Debbie Smith Act has already matched nearly 200,000 DNA cases since 2005, and with this reauthorization, Congress will be able to continue supporting our brave men and women in Law Enforcement and the victims of sexual assault and homicide. It is time to put an end to the backlog of untested and unanalyzed DNA evidence and hold perpetrators accountable.
I met with representatives of AIPAC in TX-38. When the US and Israel stand together, the world is a safer place.
